snippet: Carolina Panthers middle linebacker Luke Kuechly has been cleared from the NFL's concussion protocol by independent doctors to play Monday night against the Washington Redskins, according to team spokesman Steven Drummond....
lead_paragraph: Carolina Panthers middle linebacker Luke Kuechly has been cleared from the NFL's concussion protocol by independent doctors to play Monday night against the Washington Redskins, according to team spokesman Steven Drummond.

headline.main: Rivera: Kuechly Clears Concussion Protocol, Status Uncertain
headline.print_headline: Rivera: Kuechly Clears Concussion Protocol, Status Uncertain
